actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4945(g) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make it clear that nothing in that provision authorizes the limitation of the grants awarded by a private foundation to a fixed percentage of the number of applicants for such grants.

summary.text: Revises the Internal Revenue Code to stipulate that the provision of the Code excluding individual grants from the taxable expenditures of a private foundation does not authorize the limitation of the grants awarded by a private foundation to a fixed percentage of the number of applicants for such grants.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4945(g) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to make it clear that nothing in that provision authorizes the limitation of the grants awarded by a private foundation to a fixed percentage of the number of applicants for such grants.
